successes.title: BeSteady One - Next generation camera stabiliser
successes.description: A revolutionary camera stabiliser, designed to open up a new world of creative  possibilities for today's demanding filmmaker.

Pledges.description: "Backers Block Of Fame" A HUGE thank you from everyone here at BeSteady. You'll also have your name engraved on an aluminium supporters plaque that will be proudly mounted at BeSteady HQ.

BeSteady Goodie Bag! 
High quality kit bag emblazoned with the BeSteady logo.Perfect for carrying extra gear on set.Your name will be also on "Backers Block Of Fame" - see above!

BeSteady One BASIC! - EARLY SUPPORTER.
Be one of the first to own our next generation stabiliser at a special early backer value. Ready to use with a multirotor, crane, our handheld module or other application. Package includes 1 battery and charger, universal adapter and cinestar adapter. 
*ADD £120 to include Remote Control add on.
IMPORTANT!: Handheld module NOT included.

BeSteady One BASIC!
Be one of the first to own our next generation stabiliser at a special kickstarter value. Ready to use with a multirotor, crane, our handheld module or other application.  Package includes 1 battery and charger, universal adapter and cinestar adapter.
*ADD £120 to include Remote Control add on.
IMPORTANT!: Handheld module NOT included.

BeSteady One COMBO! - EARLY SUPPORTER.
Grab our next generation stabiliser paired with the BeSteady Handheld module at a special, early backer value.  Package also includes 2 batteries, battery charger, stand, universal adapter and cinestar adapter.
*ADD £120 to include Remote Operator package.

BeSteady One COMBO!
Grab our next generation stabiliser paired with the BeSteady Handheld module at a special kickstarter value. Package also includes 2 batteries, battery charger, stand, universal adapter and cinestar adapter.
*ADD £120 to include Remote Operator package.

BeSteady One SUPER SET! - EARLY SUPPORTER.
The ultimate BeSteady setup. Includes the COMBO package + Remote control unit + 5" AND 7" Lilliput monitors + Paralinx Arrow Plus transmitter and TWO receivers + 6 extra batteries (giving you 8 in total). We'll even throw in a goodie bag as a bonus ;). All at an incredible early supporter value!

BeSteady One SUPER SET!
The ultimate BeSteady setup. Includes the COMBO package + Remote control unit + 5" AND 7" Lilliput monitors + Paralinx Arrow Plus transmitter and TWO receivers + 6 extra batteries (giving you 8 in total). We'll even throw in a goodie bag as a bonus ;). All at our special Kickstarter value!
